name: mcp-adapter-implementation-example
description: MCP Adapter Implementation Example: A WordPress plugin demonstrating MCP Adapter integration and implementation patterns.

scripts.dev: wp-env start && echo 'WordPress development site: http://localhost:8890' && echo 'WordPress admin: http://localhost:8890/wp-admin (admin/password)'
scripts.test:db:clean: wp-env run tests-cli wp db reset --yes && wp-env run tests-cli wp core install --url=http://localhost:8891 --title='Test Site' --admin_user=admin --admin_password=password --admin_email=admin@example.com --skip-email && wp-env run tests-cli wp plugin activate mcp-adapter-implementation-example && wp-env run tests-cli wp user application-password create admin 'E2E Test App'
